snippet: The N.F.L. Pro Bowl will be played in Glendale, Ariz., next year, a week before the Super Bowl is held there.
abstract: Glendale, Ariz, will host the 2015 NFL Pro Bowl, a week before the Super Bowl is held there.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. Pro Bowl will be played in Glendale, Ariz., next year, a week before the Super Bowl is held there.

headline.main: Pro Bowl to Join Super Bowl in 2015
headline.print_headline: Pro Bowl to Join Super Bowl in 2015
